ovdesc.p: Records on this file are used to control the building of cost of funds entries for use within the MI module. BALANCE.MOVEMENT records within the build period are processed and an entries created on the MI.COF.ENTRIES file for each cost of funds (ie one entry for debit cost of funds, and one for the credit cost fo funds).
These entries are included within the MI databases as MI.AUTO.ENTRYs, which are produced via the MI.AUTO.MAPPING application.

desc.p: Where present, this field determines the year and month from which records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file will be processed to produce MI.COF.ENTRIES. The build period will run from this date until the current system date.
When this date is present, any previous MI.COF.ENTRIES (appropriate to the build options), which may have been created for the build period will be removed, and replaced by new records.

If this date is not present, build process if specified for Cost of Funds (BUILD.COF.ENTRIES is set to YES), will run on from the dates set on the MI.DATES record in the fields ACCOUNT.COF and CONTRACT.COF, depending on which type of file is being processed, up unitl the current system date.

If this date is not present, build process if specified for Additional Cost of Funds (ADD.COF.TYPE), will run on from the dates set on the appropriate MI.COF.TYPE record in the fields LAST.RUN.DATE.ACC and LAST.RUN.DATE.CON, depending on which type of file being processed, up unitl the current system date.
Must be a valid year and month.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
The field is used to determine whether account records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file will be processed by this build record, while generating MI.COF.ENTRIES for refinancing costs.
A value of YES in this field would be effective only when the field BUILD.COF.ENTRIES is set to YES.
Input must be YES or NO.
A value of Null would be interpreted as NO.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
The key to the MI.BUILD.COF.ENTRIES record if held here.
Up to ten alphanumeric characters.
This field is used to specify whether contract records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file will be processed by this build record to generate MI.COF.ENTRIES for additional cost of funds.
It is a multivalue field associated with ADD.COF.TYPE and PROCESS.COF.ACC.
Input must be YES or NO.
A null value would be interpreted as NO.
This field is used to specify whether account records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file will be processed by this build record to generate MI.COF.ENTRIES for additional cost of funds.
It is a multivalue field associated with ADD.COF.TYPE and PROCESS.COF.CON
Input must be YES or NO.
A null value would be interpreted as NO.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
Specifies the type of Additional Cost of Funds for which MI.COF.ENTRIES need to be built.
For example MI.COF.ENTRIES for Liquidity costs might be built.
This field is a multivalue field associated with PROCESS.COF.ACC, PROCESS.COF.CON .
If this field is specified, atleast one of the fields PROCESS.COF.ACC or PROCESS.COF.CON
must be set to YES.
Must be the ID of a valid record on the MI.COF.TYPE file.
Optional.
This field specifies whethere MI.COF.ENTRIES for refinancing costs, need to be built.
If this field is specified as YES, then one of the fields PROCESS.ACCOUNTS , PROCESS.CONTRACTS must have a value of YES.
If this field is YES, then the value of the fields PROCESS.ACCOUNTS and PROCESS.CONTRACTS would determine whether MI.COF.ENTRIES would be built for Accounts/Contracts.
If this field is NO or Null, then MI.COF.ENTRIES would not be generated for refinancing costs irrespective of the value of PROCESS.ACCOUNTS and PROCESS.CONTRACTS.
Input must be Yes or No.
A value of Null would be interpreted as No.
A description of the record should be input to this field.
Up to 35 alphanumeric characters
Mandatory
The field is used to determine whether contract records on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file will be processed by this build record, while generating MI.COF.ENTRIES for refinancing costs.
A value of YES in this field would be effective only when the field BUILD.COF.ENTRIES is set to YES.
Input must be YES or NO.
A value of Null would be interpreted as NO.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
Reserved for future.
NOINPUT.
